articles.description: The fight has a price point of £24.95 on Sky Sports Box Office - above the customary £19.95 price - which Eddie Hearn said would likely be a one-off for the Andy Ruiz Jr rematch in Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:
Some boxing fans have been left angry at the £24.95 pay-per-view price-point for Anthony Joshua's heavyweight contest against Kubrat Pulev on December 12.

articles.title: Merson claims Willian 'looks lost' at Arsenal and is shadow of the player he was at Chelsea - Daily Mail
articles.description: Willian, 32, arrived on a free transfer from Chelsea in the summer but has failed to score or assist across all competitions since setting up two goals in the opening game of the season.
articles.content:
Paul Merson has claimed Willian is 'looking lost' at Arsenal while also expressing concern that opposition sides have figured out how to play against star forward Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.

articles.title: Arsenal eye Dominik Szoboszlai transfer and seek to break down release clause - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Gunners are exploring ways of financing a deal for Szoboszlai, though they will face stiff competition from other European giants to land the highly-rated RB Salzburg man
articles.content:
Arsenal are exploring ways to structure a deal for highly-rated midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai, who has a £23million release clause at RB Salzburg.

articles.title: What Nicola Sturgeon's message of hope could mean for Scottish football - Daily Record
articles.description: The First Minister has spoken of a substantial return to normality in spring 2021.
articles.content:
A little hope where there once was none can go a long way but it's a commodity 2020 has rendered rather scarce.
